shouldMatch: Service Connector environment variables for Cassandra are present in configuration.
Properties reference Azure Cosmos DB endpoints and credentials via environment variables.
Spring Boot 3.x properties are mapped from Service Connector values.
Configuration enables passwordless authentication for Cassandra connections.
shouldNotMatch: Project uses hardcoded credentials for Cassandra connection.
No Service Connector environment variables found in configuration.
Properties reference local Cassandra endpoints or static passwords.
Configuration does not enable passwordless authentication.
